mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (date_day, date_plan, time_start, time_end, purpose, charge, status,registerid) VALUES (#{date_day}, #{date_plan}::date, #{time_start}, #{time_end}, #{purpose}, #{charge}, '予約中',#{registerid})
mapper.select: SELECT plan.ID, plan.date_day, plan.date_plan, plan.time_start, plan.time_end, user_infor.fullname AS charge,purpose.purpose AS purpose, plan.status FROM plan JOIN user_infor ON plan.charge = user_infor.ID JOIN purpose ON plan.purpose = purpose.ID WHERE plan.date_plan >= current_date AND plan.status = '予約中' ORDER BY plan.date_plan ASC;

SELECT plan.ID, plan.date_day, plan.date_plan, plan.time_start, plan.time_end, user_infor.fullname AS charge,purpose.purpose AS purpose, plan.status FROM plan JOIN user_infor ON plan.charge = user_infor.ID JOIN purpose ON plan.purpose = purpose.ID WHERE plan.date_plan >= current_date ORDER BY plan.date_plan ASC;
SELECT id, fullname AS charge FROM user_infor WHERE id = #{id} OR publicid=1 AND status = '使用中' ORDER BY CASE WHEN id = #{id} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, id ASC;
